content: while this pattern was first made for two pit bull mixes whose poor ears were freezing in the cold weather it has been adapted as a formula to fit any size of dog with any weight of yarn fill in the dog s measurements and your yarn gauge and you will have a fitted hat no matter your dog s breed can easily be dressed up with stripes cables colourwork or other stitch patterns rough guidelines for yarn requirements chihuahua hats used 15-17 grams of leftover sock yarn each pit bull/lab mix hats used about 100 grams of worsted each mastiff mix hat used 150 grams of aran
